General.Name: Saksiam Leasing Public Company Limited
General.Description: Saksiam Leasing Public Company Limited provides financial services in Thailand. It offers personal, nano finance, hire purchase, and non-life insurance loans, as well as other credit services. The company also sells drone equipment and agricultural drone. Saksiam Leasing Public Company Limited is incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in Uttaradit, Thailand.
